name: Frozen Hearts (AntonBezett)
description:
You arrived early in the morning, and took a few hours to rest. Now, you're ready to head to the Monastery and finish your journey.

Created for the Themed Horror Game Jam#2

An extremely truncated version of the game I originally planned, as is common with game jams.  Its short, and the story is not particularly well explained. Think of it like a proof of concept. 

I'd like to create a larger more fleshed out experience based on this, eventually. No promises on when.

Thanks for playing!

---
Note, I've discovered an issue where dialogue at the start sometimes fails to respond to mouse input. If you are unable to click to progress the dialogue, try using the space bar or controller input instead. 
---
